name: Docker Basics
description: Understanding Docker fundamentals and core concepts

definitions.beginner: Docker is a tool that packages applications and their dependencies into lightweight, portable containers that can run anywhere.
definitions.advanced: Docker is a containerization platform that uses OS-level virtualization to package applications and dependencies into isolated, portable containers with their own filesystem, networking, and process space.
